author: Margherita Stancati
title: Saudi Arabia Arrests Activists Who Campaigned for Women’s Right to Drive
text:
Authorities in Saudi Arabia have detained several prominent women’s rights activists this week, as the kingdom continues to move forcefully against critics.
At least five people have been rounded up so far, according to civil-rights activists who spoke on the condition of anonymity. Those targeted had one thing in common, the activists said: they had all participated in campaigns to allow women to drive—a right that women in the kingdom will soon have.
...
